This is a minimal example with only required fields.
Example demonstrating custom fields beyond the standard schema.

notes: The 'text' field is required and should contain the actual content to index
The 'descriptor' object must include at least 'domain' and 'intent' (required fields)
Other descriptor fields (tone, audience, stability) are optional
The 'metadata' object is entirely optional and can contain any additional data
Custom fields in the descriptor are allowed but will not be validated
The 'id' field is optional - if not provided, a UUID will be generated
validation_tips: Use the /validate endpoint to check descriptors before indexing
Hierarchical values use the arrow separator: →
Values must match schema exactly (after normalization)
Check /schema endpoint for valid values for each field
